data.title: Elective Affinities (film)
data.meta_description: Elective Affinities is a 1974 East German drama film directed by Siegfried KÃ¼hn. It follows the dynamics which follow when a couple invite two other people. The film is based on Johann Wolfgang von Goethe's 1809 novel Elective Affinities. It was released by the DEFA film studio on 27 August 1974.
